title: Industry; production, sales, 2010=100
maintainer_displayname: ZBO | Centraal Bureau voor de Statistiek
name: industry-production-sales-2010100
notes:
This table presents information about developments in production and turnover in industry (excl. construction), SIC 2008 sections B - E. The data can be divided by a number of branches according to Statistics Netherlands' Standard Industrial Classification of all Economic Activities 2008 (SIC 2008). The results are expressed in terms of indices with base year 2010. Changes on the same period in the previous year are also published. 
Turnover can be broken down into value, price and volume. The data can be divided by a number of branches according to Statistics Netherlands' Standard Industrial Classification of all Economic Activities 2008 (SIC 2008). The results are expressed in terms of indices with base year 2010. Year-on-year changes are also published. Seasonally and working-day adjusted month-on-month/quarter-on-quarter turnover and volume data are also available. These are more comparable over time and reflect the underlying trend better. 

Data available from: January 2005.

Status of the figures:
Production: the three most recent months are provisional. The figures within a reporting year are revised provisional figures until publication in December of the year concerned.
Turnover: the three most recent months are provisional.

Changes as of 16 March 2015:
Turnover and production figures of industry over the month December, 4th quarter and the year 2014 have been added.
As of 16 March 2015 this publication will be expanded with working  day and seasonally adjusted results for turnover. 
In addition, the series of working day and seasonally adjusted production are adjusted by using a different method, this has an effect on the previously published monthly and quarterly results of this series.
 
When will new figures be published?
The first provisional figures are published within approximately 40 calendar days after the reporting month.
